dialogue.speaker: Main Character
dialogue.text: What is going on? The world has been consumed by darkness.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: The world was once a beautiful place, full of life and color. But now it is but a mere shadow of its former self.

dialogue.speaker: Main Character
dialogue.text: I must do something to stop this darkness! But what can I do? I am just one person!

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: The fate of the world rests in your hands. Will you be able to save it, or will it fall further into despair?
